RuntimeErrorAnalysis.Summary: Invalid identifier or column name for Oracle
RuntimeErrorAnalysis.SampleLogOutput: org.springframework.jdbc.BadSqlGrammarException: StatementCallback; bad SQL grammar [select last_name from customer where id = 1]; nested exception is java.sql.SQLException: ORA-00904: "LAST_NAME": invalid identifier
RuntimeErrorAnalysis.RegExpPattern: org.springframework.jdbc.BadSqlGrammarException: StatementCallback; bad SQL grammar \[(.*)\]; nested exception is java.sql.SQLException: ORA-00904: "(.*)": invalid identifier
RuntimeErrorAnalysis.ProblemDetailHtml: The $2 identifier or column name specified in the SQL statement '$1' is invalid
RuntimeErrorAnalysis.SolutionDetailHtml: Check the identifiers or column names used against the database schema
